p: Phytochemicals ( i.e., molecules derived from plants and often adopted for food or traditional medicine purposes) are emerging in the very recent literature as an alternative source of investigation for the inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 Mpro. Hereafter, a series of in silico screening on these compounds is reported [131], [132], [133], [134], [135], [136], [137], [138], [139], [140].
